name: custom-fields-block
description: WordPress plugin to display native custom fields as blocks with typography and color options

scripts.package: npm run build && powershell Compress-Archive -Path custom-fields-block.php,README.md,INSTALLATION.md,build,languages -DestinationPath custom-fields-block.zip -Force
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run version-sync && git add custom-fields-block.php package.json && git commit -m "Bump version to $(node -p 'require(\'./package.json\').version')" && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run version-sync && git add custom-fields-block.php package.json && git commit -m "Bump version to $(node -p 'require(\'./package.json\').version')" && git push origin main --tags
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run version-sync && git add custom-fields-block.php package.json && git commit -m "Bump version to $(node -p 'require(\'./package.json\').version')" && git push origin main --tags
